name: OptionTest
description: Unit tests for the Option class in the Apache Commons CLI library.

methods.name: checkOption
methods.signature: void checkOption(Option, String, String, String, int, String, boolean, boolean, char, Class<?>, String, Boolean, String)

nested_classes.name: DefaultOption
nested_classes.description: Internal subclass of Option with a default value.

nested_classes.name: TestOption
nested_classes.description: Internal subclass of Option for testing purposes.

test_cases.name: testAddValue
test_cases.description: Tests the addValue and processValue methods of the Option class, ensuring they throw the expected exceptions.

test_cases.name: testBuilderEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests the builder method of the Option class, ensuring it throws an exception when insufficient parameters are provided.

test_cases.name: testBuilderInsufficientParams1
test_cases.description: Tests the builder method of the Option class, ensuring it throws an exception when insufficient parameters are provided.

test_cases.name: testBuilderInsufficientParams2
test_cases.description: Tests the builder method of the Option class, ensuring it throws an exception when insufficient parameters are provided.

test_cases.name: testBuilderInvalidOptionName0
test_cases.description: Tests the builder method of the Option class, ensuring it throws an exception when invalid option names are provided.

test_cases.name: testBuilderInvalidOptionName1
test_cases.description: Tests the builder method of the Option class, ensuring it throws an exception when invalid option names are provided.

test_cases.name: testBuilderInvalidOptionName2
test_cases.description: Tests the builder method of the Option class, ensuring it throws an exception when invalid option names are provided.

test_cases.name: testBuilderInvalidOptionName3
test_cases.description: Tests the builder method of the Option class, ensuring it throws an exception when invalid option names are provided.

test_cases.name: testBuilderInvalidOptionName4
test_cases.description: Tests the builder method of the Option class, ensuring it throws an exception when invalid option names are provided.

test_cases.name: testBuilderMethods
test_cases.description: Tests various configurations of the Option builder, ensuring the correct values are set.

test_cases.name: testClear
test_cases.description: Tests the clearValues method of the TestOption class, ensuring it correctly clears the values list.

test_cases.name: testClone
test_cases.description: Tests the clone method of the TestOption class, ensuring it creates a deep copy.

test_cases.name: testEquals
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method of the Option class, ensuring it correctly compares Option instances.

test_cases.name: testGetValue
test_cases.description: Tests the getValue methods of the Option class, ensuring they return the correct values.

test_cases.name: testHasArgName
test_cases.description: Tests the hasArgName method of the Option class, ensuring it correctly identifies if an argument name is set.

test_cases.name: testHasArgs
test_cases.description: Tests the hasArgs method of the Option class, ensuring it correctly identifies if arguments are set.

test_cases.name: testHashCode
test_cases.description: Tests the hashCode method of the Option class, ensuring it generates different hash codes for different Option instances.

test_cases.name: testSerialization
test_cases.description: Tests the serialization and deserialization of the Option class, ensuring the converter is correctly handled.

test_cases.name: testSubclass
test_cases.description: Tests the clone method of the DefaultOption subclass, ensuring it correctly clones the instance.

test_cases.name: testTypeClass
test_cases.description: Tests the getType and setType methods of the Option class, ensuring they correctly handle the type.

test_cases.name: testTypeObject
test_cases.description: Tests the getType and setType methods of the Option class, ensuring they correctly handle the type when set as an Object.
